name: Save The Planet Free
description:
It is a game that avoids black holes using the gyro.
Black holes can inflate or track the planet.
Control your planet to keep sucked into the black hole.
Find the planets and find peace in the universe.

Clear your Easy mode for beginners and build your skills!
Easy 50 stages and Hard 50 stages await your challenge.

You can also compete with planet survivors around the world in Challenge Mode, where you can test your limits!

Challenge it! Various achievements await you.
